title: Mahinda hands over SLFP chairmanship to President Maithripala
content: Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa has agreed to hand over the Chairmanship of the SLFP to President Maithripala Sirisena, SLFP sources told Media. The Central Committee of the SLFP is sheduled to meet today at 4pm to ratify the appointment of President Sirisena as Chairman….
